items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is FIRE !!!!!
items.body: This dress is FIRE !!!! It's so pretty and the material is nice and thick. I got so many compliments when I wore it. I'm 5'4" and weigh 135 lbs. I ordered the medium. It fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Kim Nicoliello

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but classy dress for a formal occassion
items.body: Very nice quality, color, and elegant. It fits well. Read more
items.author: Marlyn Agunias

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars â€œSunshine Served With a Side of Sassâ€
items.body: Let me just say, this dress is everything. The ZESICA strapless dress is giving me summer goddess vibes from the moment I slip it on. It is flowy in all the right places, hugs just enough to remind me I still got it, and makes me want to twirl down the street with an iced latte in hand like I am in a rom com. The fabric is lightweight but not flimsy, which means I can chase after errands (or grandkids) without worrying about a wardrobe malfunction. And can we talk about the strapless cut? It stays put. No tugging, no awkward readjustments, just easy breezy chic. Pair it with sandals and sunnies, or throw on some wedges and big earrings, and suddenly you are that girl who looks like she planned her outfit when really you just threw it on in five seconds. Bottom line: This dress is basically summer in fabric form. Cute, comfy, and a little flirty, it is the dress that does all the work so you can just show up and sparkle. Read more
items.author: Paige B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Iâ€™m 5â€™5â€ 120-125lbs and have a smaller frame. I ordered an XS and S, but kept the XS. It fit well and the fabric was much nicer and heavier than I expected, which was great. The flower looked nice too. There was the perfect amount of stretch. The only part that couldâ€™ve been better was the elastic and non-slip at the top. It could have been a little wider to keep it from digging in (not too small, just a weirdly thin elastic). The length wasnâ€™t bad but it was in between long and mid calve so I used peel and stick hem tape that you put on and then put in the dryer. It ended up doing really well. I wore it to a fundraiser and got a ton of compliments. Everyone was surprised that I got it from Amazon. Read more
items.author: Kaylie Dianne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, Gorgeous, Gorgeous
items.body: This dress was absolutely fabulous. The style, the texture. Fit like a glove, thick enough not to be see through. Just the right amount of stretchThe flower was perfectly placed. I couldn't say enough about this gorgeous dress. Read more
items.author: BettyAnn Nikitin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Comfortable
items.body: Beautiful dress, true to size. Great Value, comfort and material. Read more
items.author: Kelly McCollum

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10
items.body: LOVEEE!!! so flattering and pretty! Got of compliments and felt so confident. Normally harder for me to find good fitting strapless clothes with a larger chest but loved this Read more
items.author: R.Mo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress for wedding guest .
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The dress was very nice , comfortable and well priced . I went by the size according to amazons suggestion but it was slightly big , wish I bought the small , was large in the waist area and I had to keep pulling it up and I do not have small boobs . Good quality and very pretty , it did arrive very wrinkly so I had to steam it . Read more
items.author: Lisa Marie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pink, Blue, Royalblue, Apricot, Rose, Black, Green, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
